A Tense Confrontation

<setup: dimly lit room, anxious characters>
<optional narration: Silence fills the air.>
Pyotr Petrovitch: “Excuse me, but this is important.”

Sonia: “What do you mean? I don’t understand.”

Luzhin: “How is it to be then?”

---

<setup: shocked expressions, children quiet>
<optional narration: Tension thickens.>
Sonia: “A hundred-rouble note? Missing?”

Pyotr Petrovitch: “If you know, speak now. It ends here.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Pyotr Petrovitch accuses Sonia of stealing a hundred-rouble note, threatening serious consequences if she does not confess.
